description: As they read a variety of mostly contemporary literature from English-speaking countries around the world, students learn strategies of critical analysis and interpretation. They also practice and develop skills in writing and oral communication. This course is required of those beginning the English major. It is not recommended for general education students. Prerequisite: FYW or concurrent enrollment in FYW.
name: Literary Studies
notes: Closed to rising Seniors and Juniors except by permission of department.
Open to first-year students who have fulfilled the FYW requirement.
prerequisites: FYW or concurrent enrollment in FYW.
